notices.title: Election Schedule Released
notices.content: The detailed election schedule for all positions has been released. Please check the official notice board for more details.

notices.title: Voting Process Guidelines
notices.content: All students are requested to follow the voting guidelines. Ensure you bring valid ID proof and follow the instructions at polling stations.

notices.title: Results Declaration
notices.content: The election results will be declared live on this website. Stay tuned for real-time updates as votes are counted.

notices.title: Nomination Deadline Extended
notices.content: The deadline for submitting nominations has been extended until further notice. Candidates are requested to submit their forms at the earliest.

notices.title: Election Committee Meeting
notices.content: An important meeting of the Election Committee will be held tomorrow. All members are required to attend.
